name: places/ChIJN0nNRRFawokR-gvw5d81jKY
adrFormatAddress: 770 Broadway, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text:
Title: Exceptional Service Beyond Expectations

I recently had the opportunity to visit this Bank of America branch for matters related to my late brother's estate. Despite my initial reservations due to the branch's low star rating on Google, my experience was nothing short of extraordinary.

Upon arrival, the meet-and-greet staff greeted me with the utmost courtesy and kindly offered me a bottle of water. The branch's location is a significant plus; it is easily accessible by public transportation and nestled in a delightful part of the city. The modern design of the branch, combined with its warm and inviting atmosphere, was immediately reassuring.

The staff here are not just welcoming but also incredibly eager to help. My 1 pm appointment was respected and met on time, a testament to the staff's professionalism. Ms. Rita, the associate who helped me, deserves a special thanks. She was empathetic and efficient, offering heartfelt condolences for my brother's passing and expertly walking me through the necessary procedures, ensuring I understood every step. Ms. Rita's professionalism and kindness made a significant difference in my experience.

The branch's interiors also contribute to the positive experience. It features a stylish waiting area with a large TV and a separate room for ATMs, all adding to the branch's modern and comfortable setting.

In summary, my visit here was productive and surprisingly pleasant. The exceptional service, especially by Ms. Rita, and the modern facilities at this branch far exceeded my initial expectations. I'm delighted I decided to visit, and I highly commend the team, particularly Ms. Rita, for their exemplary service.

originalText.text: Samantha Hicks helped me a lot. She explained every detail. Very professional yet so friendly,great attitude.

originalText.text:
We’ve had our gripes with Union square BofA, but yesterday I had guys go above and beyond for us. Not all banks would do what they did, and we are very grateful. For that, aaaaall the fees are now justified. Simply for the kindness which is rare in this world.

One thing, BofA, if you’re reading this. Please figure out how to put a staff into the 21st and 1st ATM location. If you push the bagel place out, I’ll transfer most of my accounts to BofA and will forever sing your praises.

originalText.text: Worst experience. Just moved into the neighborhood and went to deposit a check. They refused to deposit the check to the account because the person who wrote the check forgot to put “Inc” behind the company name.   Ridiculous!  In all the years I’ve banked with B of A no one has ever refused a deposit because the “Inc” was missing.  Will look to move my account after this. I don’t want to have to worry about every check and if some one put Inc after our name.
